msbt.message: Don't be lookin' for any dust, now. 'Cause you're liable to find it!
I believe this is what the kids call a "man cave," right?
Make yourself at home. Just don't touch ANYTHING. Gahaha!
Alright! Now that we're in private, we can talk about anything we want!<10_4 /> So, uhwhat's up?
So, whaddaya think it smells like in here?<10_4 /> FLOWERS?!Yeah, I guess it does. Gahaha!
Hey, I got all sorts of folks comin' by later today, so let's get right to it, .
You'd think this was a party or somethin', what with in the house!
You know what? Bein' surrounded by friends like this is just what I've always wanted.
Hey now, are you usin' my place as a meetin' spot or somethin'?Well, I'll allow it. But just 'cause it's you, kiddo! Gahaha!
Oh man. This is startin' to remind me of the parties we had when I was a youngster
Hey, you tryin' to join the family here or what? <10_4 />Gahaha! Just joshin'.
